name: tg-index-app
description: An app to index Telegram chats for easy content searching.

API_ID.description: Your Telegram API ID obtained from https://my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Your Telegram API hash obtained from https://my.telegram.org/apps

INDEX_SETTINGS.description: Configuration for indexing (channels, search filters, etc.). Refer to tg-index documentation.

SESSION_STRING.description: Generated by running generate_session_string.py. Allows app to interact with your Telegram account.

PORT.description: Port the web app listens on. Default is fine.

DEBUG.description: Set to 'true' ONLY for development/testing. Keep 'false' for production.

TGINDEX_USERNAME.description: Username for app authentication (if you want to restrict access).

PASSWORD.description: Password for app authentication (if you set a username).

SECRET_KEY.description: Secure key for session handling. Generate using a Python secret key generator.
